  • Constructor Details

    • Snake

      public Snake(String spriteSheetPath, int initialX, int initialY, int initialSize, int segmentSize, long speed)
      Constructor for Snake. Initializes the snake with the provided parameters.
      Parameters:
      spriteSheetPath - Path to the sprite sheet image.
      initialX - Initial X-coordinate of the snake.
      initialY - Initial Y-coordinate of the snake.
      initialSize - Initial size of the snake.
      segmentSize - Size of each snake segment.
      speed - Movement speed of the snake.

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      Draws the snake on the provided GraphicsContext.
      Parameters:
      gc - The GraphicsContext on which to draw the snake.

    • move

      public void move(long currentTime)
      Move the snake's head to a new position based on the current direction. If the current time minus the last move time is greater than or equal to the speed, update the snake's position and check for collisions with the body. If a collision occurs, set the game over flag to true.
      Parameters:
      currentTime - The current time in milliseconds.

    • isOutOfBounds

      public boolean isOutOfBounds()
      Checks if the head of the snake is out of bounds. The head is considered out of bounds if its x-coordinate is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the width of the game divided by the cell size, or if its y-coordinate is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the height of the game divided by the cell size.
      Returns:
      true if the head is out of bounds, false otherwise.

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if the game is over.
      Returns:
      true if the game is over, false otherwise.

    • grow

      public void grow()
      Adds a new segment to the snake's body and updates the segment directions. The new segment is placed at the position of the current tail and continues in the same direction as the last segment.

    • changeDirection

      public void changeDirection(Direction newDirection)
      Changes the direction of the snake.
      Parameters:
      newDirection - The new direction to change to.

    • isCollidingWithFood

      public boolean isCollidingWithFood(Food food)
      Checks if the snake's head is colliding with the given food.
      Parameters:
      food - The food object to check collision with.
      Returns:
      true if the head of the snake is colliding with the food, false otherwise.

    • checkCollisionWithPaddle

      public boolean checkCollisionWithPaddle(Paddle paddle)
      Checks if the head of the snake is colliding with the paddle.
      Parameters:
      paddle - The paddle object to check collision with.
      Returns:
      true if the head of the snake is colliding with the paddle, false otherwise.

    • increaseScore

      public void increaseScore(int increment)
      Increases the score of the snake by the specified amount.
      Parameters:
      increment - The amount by which to increase the score.

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Returns the current score of the snake.
      Returns:
      The score of the snake.
